long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blob Drop is an entertaining game available as a Chrome Extension. It belongs to the popular Suika genre and revolves around watermelons. In this merge puzzle game, your objective is to strategically drop different types of blobs into a cup. As you drop them, the bouncy blobs fall individually, and when two blobs of the same type collide, they merge to form a larger blob. The challenge lies in creating the biggest blob possible without causing the cup to overflow. Be careful, as if the cup becomes too full and a blob spills over, the game ends. Test your skills and see how large you can grow your blob! You can enjoy this game for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
